an4.122:2.8: When challenged, he uses the plural as a defense mechanism, disguising his personal reaction as an undefined “us”, implicating the Saṅgha as a whole.
an4.122:4.9: This phrase says a little more than just “My family is wealthy”. From form and context, it expresses a slight distance or reflection on this fact, an acknowledgement of wealth rather than a direct statement. See eg AN 8.24
